definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
to sing loudly/fig. to mouth slogans
to sing loudly/to lift one's voice in song
to compose (a piece of music)/(fig.) to create, by one's actions, a narrative (generally one that can be recounted with pride)
to return in triumph/to return victorious
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
